Concept handles are like addresses

Last updated on April 7, 2021

Just like a physical address indicates a certain location in the real world, and how a digital address indicates the IP location in the digital realm, so does a concept handle point to a certain location in conceptual space. In this view, concept handles are pointers to a certain location in conceptual space, which abstract away from explicit cues.
